topic.title: Set up as an OpenVPN Server
topic.shortdesc: Yeastar S Series PBX - VPN Server App helps you configure the PBX as an OpenVPN server. There is a Graphical User Interface for administrator to set up an OpenVPN server.

body.p: This topic shows you how to set up an OpenVPN server with OpenVPN authentication, and allocate a static IP address for each VPN client.
